kv18.2:1.6_0: Abhinimmito jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv18.2:2.6_0: Āyasmā ānando jino satthā sammāsambuddho sabbaññū sabbadassāvī dhammassāmī dhammappaṭisaraṇoti?
kv18.2:3.6_0: vitthārenapi kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ;
kv18.2:3.7_0: saṅkhittavitthārenapi kho ahaṁ, sāriputta, dhammaṁ deseyyaṁ;
kv18.2:3.11_0: Tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammo desitoti.
kv18.2:4.6_0: sanidānāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no anidānaṁ;
kv18.2:4.7_0: sappāṭihāriyāhaṁ, bhikkhave, dhammaṁ desemi, no appāṭihāriyaṁ;
kv18.2:4.8_4: sappāṭihāriyaṁ dhammaṁ desayato no appāṭihāriyaṁ karaṇīyo ovādo karaṇīyā anusāsanī;
kv18.2:4.9_0: alañca pana vo, bhikkhave, tuṭṭhiyā alaṁ attamanatāya alaṁ somanassāya—
kv18.2:4.10_0: sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto dhammo, suppaṭipanno saṅgho’ti.
kv18.2:4.11_0: Imasmiñca pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne dasasahassilokadhātu akampitthā”ti.
kv18.2:4.14_0: Tena hi buddhena bhagavatā dhammo desitoti.
